chapter.title: Runtime Options
chapter.para: A list of things that can be set and/or altered at runtime.

section.title: --help, -h, -?
section.para: Displays the available runtime options.

section.title: --version, -V
section.para: Displays the version number.

section.title: --stdin, -I
section.para: A file to read input from instead of stdin.

section.title: --stdout, -O
section.para: A file to print output to instead of stdout.

section.title: --codepage-all, -C
section.para: The codepage to use for grammar, input, and output streams. Defaults to ISO-8859-1.

section.title: --codepage-grammar
section.para: Codepage to use for grammar. Overrides --codepage-all.

section.title: --codepage-input
section.para: Codepage to use for input. Overrides --codepage-all.

section.title: --codepage-output
section.para: Codepage to use for output and error streams. Overrides --codepage-all.

section.title: --locale-all, -L
section.para: The locale to use for grammar, input, and output streams. Defaults to en_US_POSIX.

section.title: --locale-grammar
section.para: Locale to use for grammar. Overrides --locale-all.

section.title: --locale-input
section.para: Locale to use for input. Overrides --locale-all.

section.title: --locale-output
section.para: Locale to use for output and error streams. Overrides --locale-all.

section.title: --stderr, -E
section.para: A file to print errors to instead of stderr.

section.title: --vislcg-compat, -p
section.para: Tells the grammar compiler to be compatible with older VISLCG syntax. Currently this changes all Difference set operators to Fail-Fast set operators.

section.title: --grammar, -g
section.para: The grammar file to use for the run.

section.title: --trace
section.para: Prints debug output alongside with normal output. Deleted readings are prepended a semicolon.

section.title: --prefix
section.para: Sets the prefix for mapping. Defaults to @.

section.title: --sections
section.para: Number of sections to run. Defaults to running all sections.

section.title: --single-run
section.para: Only runs each section once.

section.title: --no-mappings
section.para: Disables running any MAP, ADD, or REPLACE rules.

section.title: --no-corrections
section.para: Disables running any SUBSTITUTE or APPEND rules.

section.title: --grammar-out
section.para: Writes out the processed grammar to a file. Mainly for debugging.

section.title: --grammar-info
section.para: Gathers statistics about the grammar and writes that to a file. This must be used with a file --stdin source as it has to re-run the applicator several times.

section.title: --num-windows
section.para: Number of windows to keep in before/ahead buffers. Defaults to 2.

section.title: --always-span
section.para: Forces all scanning tests to always span across window boundaries.

section.title: --soft-limit
section.para: Number of cohorts after which the SOFT-DELIMITERS kick in. Defaults to 300.

section.title: --hard-limit
section.para: Number of cohorts after which the window is delimited forcefully. Defaults to 500.

section.title: --no-magic-readings
section.para: Prevents running rules on magic readings.

section.title: --dep-allow-loops
section.para: Allows the creation of circular dependencies.
